name: Portable Export
description: Standalone portable HTML/JS viewer for offline catalogue access on CD, USB, or downloadable ZIP. Zero server required.
author: The Archive and Heritage Group (Pty) Ltd
features: Self-contained HTML/JS viewer for offline catalogue access
Export full or partial catalogue (fonds, repository, custom scope)
Edit mode with researcher exchange format (v1.0)
Admin UI with background processing and progress tracking

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with full export pipeline and static viewer
